author: daxian-dbw
body: There are CRLF line ending sequences in this file and it shows as modified after a sync on my Linux machine.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Use https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5314/files?w=1 to view the diff after ignoring the whitespace changes.

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Heh, I ran into this very issue last night.

title: Change line ending in Rename-Computer.Tests.ps1 to LF
